description:
The First Neck, he is considered to be the leader and the most powerful of the Orochi. Tsubasa is a tall teal-haired bishounen, as well as a (presumed) sociopathic criminal with a long record, starting with the murder of his abusive father, whom he killed in order to protect his younger brother. Tsubasa is also Souma`s biological older brother, having left the young child in the care of the Oogami family when he went on the run.
His mech, Take no Yasukunazuchi, has deployable wing-like structures which it uses to fly, and attacks with swords mounted on its arms.
In personal combat, Tsubasa mainly uses a sword, although he has shown some skill with throwing knives as well.
He carries the mark of Orochi over his heart.
name: Tsubasa
